dependencies Class

Defined in: src/dependencies/base.js:13
Module: comments

Base constructor of the dependencies object. This constructor is incomplete by itself, requiring the format-extensions.

__fileInterface

()

Defined in src/dependencies/base.js:88

This method parses arguments for both 'files' and 'filenames' methods.

config

(
  • config
)

Defined in src/dependencies/amd/requirejs.js:38

Parses out configurations. Any options the usual r.js would take.

    options: {
        // base url where to look for module files
        // and relative to which the module paths will be defined
        // (must coincide with that defined in mainConfigFile)
        basePath: './src',

        mainConfigFile: 'amdconfig.js',

        paths: {

        },
    }

Sets configuration for reading amd-requirejs

Parameters:

  • config Object

filenames

(
  • [origin]
  • [depth]
  • [base]
)
Array

Defined in src/dependencies/base.js:104

Takes a series of options

Parameters:

  • [origin] String optional 
    the origin of the modules to be listed:
- internal, external, [all]
  • [depth] Number | Boolean optional 
    the max depth of dependencies to go through
if boolean && true, goes to the very end of the tree.
  • [base] String optional 
    the base path to which filenames should be relative
defaults to no base path

Returns:

Array: 
array of dependency filenames

files

() Object

Defined in src/dependencies/base.js:163

Implements the same interface as '.filenames', but instead of returning filenames, returns file objects.

Returns:

Object:

file objects

ids

(
  • origin
)

Defined in src/dependencies/amd/requirejs.js:138

Returns the ids of the modules the module on this file depends on. Optionally filter the modules by origin

Parameters:

  • origin String

    default: 'all'

Returns:

Array

ids

(
  • [origin]
)

Defined in src/dependencies/base.js:53

Returns the ids of modules on which the current file depends, optionally filtered by module origin.

This method is implemented on format files, as the dependency parsing differs according to formats.

Parameters:

  • [origin] String optional

parseRequireJsConfig

(
  • fpath
)

Defined in src/dependencies/amd/requirejs.js:82

Takes a path to a file in which requirejs configurations are defined and returns the parsed configurations object.

Parameters:

  • fpath Object

resolve

(
  • id
)
String

Defined in src/dependencies/base.js:65

Takes a module id and returns the full filename to the file that stores the module depended upon.

Implemented at format level.

Parameters:

  • id String

Returns:

String:

filename

resolve

(
  • id
)

Defined in src/dependencies/amd/requirejs.js:98

Takes a module id, tries to find the module file path [1] against absolutePath [2] against relativePath [3] against a paths object [4] using node require.resolve strategy.

Parameters:

  • id Object

Properties

basePath

String

Defined in src/dependencies/amd/requirejs.js:69

Path to which relative paths will be solved against.

Default: dirname of the file object.

Unknown

Defined in src/dependencies/base.js:27

Stores reference to the file object this dependencies object refers to.
